item.title: New SCU LinkedIn post!
item.description: Santa Clara University is a Jesuit, Catholic university that educates citizens and leaders to build a more just, humane, and sustainable world. In addition to abundant career opportunities provided by our ideal location, students have access to a variety of educational, cultural, and recreational activities. The 106-acre campus features beautiful gardens and landscaping, and has more than 51 buildings, including 10 residence halls, two libraries, a student center, and extensive athletic facilities.
item.author: Santa Clara University
item.tags: Jesuit, arts, sciences, business, law, engineering, undergraduate, and graduate
